description: This file defines functions and constants related to managing the topology tree of a controller in an networking system, including initialization, updates, querying, cleanup, and status checks for agent nodes.

methods.name: map_ctrl_topology_tree_init
methods.description: Initializes controller's topology tree data structures.

methods.name: map_add_as_child_of_controller
methods.description: Adds a controller's neighbor as a child node in the topology tree.

methods.name: map_build_topology_tree
methods.description: Builds topology tree from neighbor list TLV data.

methods.name: map_register_topology_query_retry
methods.description: Registers a retry timer for topology query.

methods.name: map_register_delayed_topology_query_retry
methods.description: Registers a delayed retry timer for topology query.

methods.name: map_cleanup_agent
methods.description: Removes a dead agent (ALE) and cleans up resources.

methods.name: map_extend_ale_deletion
methods.description: Extends the deletion process for an ALE.

methods.name: map_is_topology_update_required
methods.description: Checks if topology update is needed based on last response timestamp.

methods.name: map_get_local_agent_ale
methods.description: Retrieves the local agent's ALE data from hash.

methods.name: map_is_local_agent
methods.description: Checks if the given ALE node is the local agent.

methods.name: map_is_controller
methods.description: Checks if the given ALE node is a controller.
